alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tooele County through 245 PM MDT... At 218 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, or 21 miles southwest of Dugway English Village, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Utah Test and Training Range South and Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
